RelatedSentence: BEIJING , May 19 ( Xinhua ) -- Senior Chinese official Wang Qishan has told the country 's discipline inspection organs to be strict , specific and genuine when investigating officials .

A0: Wang , chief of the Communist Party of China -LRB- CPC -RRB- Central Commission for Discipline Inspection -LRB- CCDI -RRB-
RelatedSentence: Wang urged disciplinary officials to improve their work methods and styles and shoulder responsibilities to uphold laws and regulations and resolutely stem the spread of corruption .
